name: Melted into Existence
description:
You are a cave man awaken from a frozen slumber with nothing. Use your resources to survive and make your way up the mountain.  You only know so much, you will have to figure it out on your own.

Just like the cave man, you start with nothing but sticks and stones, No knowledge on how to complete the level. Use the items to figure out your way to the end

!!!!!!!!!!!!!HINTS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Throw rock at log to cross gap.

knife or torch to enter cave. 

"P" to hard restart level

You can use rocks to distract wolves
